name: Dead Rain
description:
Defend your city! The world is ending, and its up to you to find out how long the planet can defend.

Missiles are raining from the sky, and you must fire counter-missiles to intercept their paths. The speed and intensity of the assault will increase over time, and there will be power ups to help you. Will they be enough?

Features:

- Newly improved visuals
- 3 unique themes to choose from
- Assistave Power ups
- Leaderboards ranking the world's greatest defenders

This game has no ads or in-app purchases.
